newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Dhaka stocks seen continuing their rally.
newsitem.headline: Dhaka stocks seen continuing their rally.

text.p: Shares on the Dhaka Stock Exchange are expected to continue their rally when the market reopens after the Moslem Friday weekend, brokers said.
"The market is short of securities. Substantial supply of scrips is the only remedy to stabilise the market," said broker Mahbub Morshed.
"No one is willing to sell shares," said another broker. "They are waiting for further gains and this is not a healthy sign."
The DSE all share price index closed 162.67 points, or 5.76 percent, higher on Thursday at 2,986.29 on turnover of 491.9 million taka.
